adverb.description: With little or no space or time in between.
examples: the medical sergeant follows closely behind the squad

adverb.description: In a way that involves a strong resemblance or connection.
examples: the students had to answer questions closely related to what they just learned
the real-world injuries closely mirrored the university's experimental data

adverb.description: In a careful and attentive way.
examples: patients have to be watched closely for side effects
